name: Marshmallow in Fruit Land
description:
Twitter  | Patreon | YouTube

Marshmallow in Fruit Land is a little puzzle platformer game about collecting fruit! Your main character, Marshmallow, can jump into different colors of fruit juice to change his color (and even mix them together)! Explore each stage carefully and use your color-changing abilities to solve some tricky puzzles and find all of the fruits!

  • 24 Main Stages
  • 6 Bonus Stages (for especially good puzzlers who find all the hidden items!)
  • Colorblind Mode
  • Comes with a full color instruction manual, with a printable version as well!
  • OS: Windows
  • Controller Support
